title: Enhancing Language Learning Effectiveness Through Mobile Learning Games (MLG)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Learner role: Students/job seekers, Domain expertise: Intermediate, Delivery method: Online real-time (Zoom, etc.), Evaluation method: Project-based assessment, Technology environment: Digital devices provided

learning_goals: Learners acquire 50 job-related language vocabulary items with 80% accuracy within three days using MLG.
Learners can consistently utilize language expressions at over 90% proficiency for two weeks after game-based learning.
Learners can compare and explain the cognitive effectiveness differences between MLG and traditional learning methods.

resources: Access rights to mobile learning game platform

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
